Package za.co.vortexit.pkg3.v0.autoshutdown

Class JSONManager

java.lang.Object
za.co.vortexit.pkg3.v0.autoshutdown.JSONManager
public class JSONManager extends Object
Utility class for managing JSON data. Provides methods for reading, writing, and manipulating JSON objects.
